author: rbb
msg: Make Apache use the new ap_create_process call.  This is the first of a
group of patches.  This patch, allows the core server to compile and
serve pages.  There is a set of patches which will follow to allow the
standard modules to use ap_create_process.  This change should make
writing code which spawns new processes easy to read and understand.

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Compile with multi-threaded switch so we get things like thread safe

author: bjh
msg: Map strcasecmp to stricmp if stricmp is available but strcasecmp isn't.

author: rbb
msg: Bring signals up to the current APR parameter order spec.
